items.consumables

Class HealthPotion

  • java.lang.Object
    • items.consumables.AbstractConsumable
      • items.consumables.HealthPotion
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Consumable, Item

    public class HealthPotion
extends AbstractConsumable
    This class of Consumable is a Health Potion, an item common to many RPGs. It gives a target character a certain amount of health instantaneously.

    This is a Consumable-type Item with a modifier stat (mod) of 15 that modifies (buffedStat) "HP". The duration of this consumable is 0, and the name of this consumable is "health potion".

    Note: this was the first consumable created for this system.

    Author:
    Dr. Cheese

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HealthPotion()
      The base constructor of the HealthPotion class sets the buffedStat variable to "HP", sets the mod stat to 15, sets the duration stat to 0, and sets the name of the item to "health potion".

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void apply(AbstractChar subject)
      This method checks what the difference between the target's current HP and max HP is, and depending on the size of the difference does not apply (current HP is max), heals the target to full (difference between current and max HP is less than or equal to the mod stat), or heals the target for mod HP.

      • Methods inherited from class items.consumables.AbstractConsumable

        equals, getBuffedStat, getDuration, getMod, getName, setDuration, setMod, setName, toString

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • HealthPotion

        public HealthPotion()
        The base constructor of the HealthPotion class sets the buffedStat variable to "HP", sets the mod stat to 15, sets the duration stat to 0, and sets the name of the item to "health potion".

    • Method Detail

      • apply

        public void apply(AbstractChar subject)
        This method checks what the difference between the target's current HP and max HP is, and depending on the size of the difference does not apply (current HP is max), heals the target to full (difference between current and max HP is less than or equal to the mod stat), or heals the target for mod HP.
        Parameters:
        subject - The target Character to use the item on.
